entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Souris
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:22 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Local blowing snow near noon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
